## `SetDownloadFolder`

Sets the directory path\index{web harvester!settings} where the web harvester will download files.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetDownloadFolder(string path)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` path | The folder to download files during web harvesting. |
:::
